title: Flickerly
description: Movie discovery web application using SvelteKit and TypeScript, leveraging the TMDB API for dynamic movie data.

title: KIckTrivia
description: A fast-paced football quiz game to test your football knowledge across diverse categories and challenge yourself to become a trivia champion.

title: Taskflow
description: A sleek task management app using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Stay organized and streamline your daily workflow with ease.
